participant_1.background:
I'd love to be a pilot like my brother.
My hair is usually auburn, but I occasionally dye it a different color to reflect my changing passions.
i don t like kids.
I found a new way to escape the stress of work by playing music with my friends.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time.
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.
i m about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.
i am from tennessee.
I enjoy making things for my family.

content.text: Hello!  How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking.  How about yourself?
I am doing well too! I'm excited to be moving to college soon.
Oh wow, that sounds exciting!  What school are you going to?
I'm going to a very liberal school in Tennessee.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun there.
Thank you!  I'm looking forward to it.
So, what are you interested in?
I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time.  I also enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
That's cool!  I like to cook too, but I'm not very good at it.  I also enjoy listening to music, but I don't listen to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Oh, that's too bad.  They're my favorite band.
Well, I'm sure you'll meet some people who like them at your new school.
I hope so!  I'm also looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll have a great time in college.
